Module pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project
Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.repository

Class AgendaRepository

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.repository.AgendaRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AgendaRepository extends Object implements Serializable
Repository class for managing agenda entries.

  • Method Details

    • requestColabTaskList

      public Optional<List<AgendaEntry>> requestColabTaskList(Collaborator collaborator, Data startDate, Data endDate, int filterSelection)
      Requests the task list for a collaborator within a date range and filter.
      Parameters:
      collaborator - The collaborator.
      startDate - The start date of the range.
      endDate - The end date of the range.
      filterSelection - The filter selection.
      Returns:
      An optional list of agenda entries.

    • requestColabPlannedTaskList

      public Optional<List<AgendaEntry>> requestColabPlannedTaskList(Collaborator collaborator, Data startDate, Data endDate, int filterSelection)
      Requests the planned task list for a collaborator within a date range and filter.
      Parameters:
      collaborator - The collaborator.
      startDate - The start date of the range.
      endDate - The end date of the range.
      filterSelection - The filter selection.
      Returns:
      An optional list of planned agenda entries.

    • requestPossibleColabPlannedTaskList

      public Optional<List<AgendaEntry>> requestPossibleColabPlannedTaskList(Collaborator collaborator, Data startDate, Data endDate, int filterSelection)
      Requests the possible planned task list for a collaborator within a specified date range and filter selection. This method retrieves a list of planned tasks that have the potential to be marked as done, considering the provided collaborator, date range, and filter selection.
      Parameters:
      collaborator - The collaborator whose tasks are being requested.
      startDate - The start date of the range within which tasks are being requested.
      endDate - The end date of the range within which tasks are being requested.
      filterSelection - The filter selection used to determine which tasks to include in the list.
      Returns:
      An optional list of possible planned agenda entries for the specified collaborator within the given date range and filter selection. If the list is empty, the optional will be empty as well.

    • getTaskPlannedList

      public List<AgendaEntry> getTaskPlannedList(Collaborator collaborator, Data startDate, Data endDate, int filterSelection)
      Gets the planned task list for a collaborator within a date range and filter.
      Parameters:
      collaborator - The collaborator.
      startDate - The start date of the range.
      endDate - The end date of the range.
      filterSelection - The filter selection.
      Returns:
      A list of planned agenda entries.

    • getPossibleDoneTaskPlannedList

      public List<AgendaEntry> getPossibleDoneTaskPlannedList(Collaborator collaborator, Data startDate, Data endDate, int filterSelection)
      Retrieves a list of planned agenda entries for a collaborator within the specified date range and filter selection that have the potential to be marked as done. This method considers only those tasks that are currently planned and have not started yet, and are within the provided date range.
      Parameters:
      collaborator - The collaborator for whom the tasks are being retrieved.
      startDate - The start date of the range within which tasks are being retrieved.
      endDate - The end date of the range within which tasks are being retrieved.
      filterSelection - The filter selection used to determine which tasks to include in the list.
      Returns:
      A list of planned agenda entries for the specified collaborator within the given date range and filter selection, which have the potential to be marked as done. The list is sorted by start date.

    • changedTaskStatusList

      public Optional<List<AgendaEntry>> changedTaskStatusList(Collaborator collaborator, Data startDate, Data endDate, int filterSelection, String confirmation, int selectedTask)
      Requests the list of tasks with changed status for a collaborator within a date range and filter.
      Parameters:
      collaborator - The collaborator.
      startDate - The start date of the range.
      endDate - The end date of the range.
      filterSelection - The filter selection.
      confirmation - The confirmation status.
      selectedTask - The selected task ID.
      Returns:
      An optional list of tasks with changed status.

    • getTaskList

      public List<AgendaEntry> getTaskList(Collaborator collaborator, Data startDate, Data endDate, int filterSelection)
      Gets the task list for a collaborator within a date range and filter.
      Parameters:
      collaborator - The collaborator.
      startDate - The start date of the range.
      endDate - The end date of the range.
      filterSelection - The filter selection.
      Returns:
      A list of agenda entries.

    • taskListCreated

      public boolean taskListCreated(Collaborator collaborator, Data startDate, Data endDate, int filterSelection)
      Checks if a task list was created for a collaborator within a date range and filter.
      Parameters:
      collaborator - The collaborator.
      startDate - The start date of the range.
      endDate - The end date of the range.
      filterSelection - The filter selection.
      Returns:
      true if the task list was created, false otherwise.

      Parameters:
      taskList - The list of agenda entries.
      Returns:
      The sorted list of agenda entries.

      public Optional<AgendaEntry> registerAgendaEntry(ToDoEntry agendaEntry, Data startingDate)
      Registers an agenda entry.
      Parameters:
      agendaEntry - The to-do entry to be registered.
      startingDate - The starting date for the entry.
      Returns:
      The registered agenda entry, if present.

    • addAgendaEntry

      public boolean addAgendaEntry(AgendaEntry entry)
      Adds an agenda entry.
      Parameters:
      entry - The agenda entry to add.
      Returns:
      true if the entry was added successfully, false otherwise.

    • addAgendaBackup

      public boolean addAgendaBackup(AgendaEntry entry)
      Adds a backup copy of the provided agenda entry to the backup agenda list.
      Parameters:
      entry - The agenda entry to be added to the backup list.
      Returns:
      true if the backup copy of the agenda entry was successfully added to the backup list, false otherwise (e.g., if the provided entry is not valid for backup).

    • validateEntry

      public boolean validateEntry(AgendaEntry entry)
      Validates an agenda entry.
      Parameters:
      entry - The agenda entry to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the entry is valid, false otherwise.

    • validateBackUp

      public boolean validateBackUp(AgendaEntry entry)
      Validates whether the provided agenda entry is unique in the backup agenda list. This method checks if an agenda entry with the same details as the provided entry already exists in the backup agenda list.
      Parameters:
      entry - The agenda entry to be validated.
      Returns:
      true if the provided agenda entry is unique and can be added to the backup list, false if there is already an identical entry in the backup list.

    • postponeTask

      public boolean postponeTask(int agendaTaskID, Data postponeDate, AgendaEntry agendaEntry)
      Postpones a task in the agenda.
      Parameters:
      agendaTaskID - The ID of the agenda task.
      postponeDate - The new date to postpone the task to.
      agendaEntry - The agenda entry to be postponed.
      Returns:
      true if the task was postponed successfully, false otherwise.

    • validPostponeDate

      public boolean validPostponeDate(AgendaEntry task, Data postponeDate)
      Checks if the postpone date is valid.
      Parameters:
      task - The task to check.
      postponeDate - The postpone date to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the postpone date is valid, false otherwise.

    • getTaskByResponsible

      Parameters:
      agendaTaskID - The ID of the agenda task.
      agendaTasks - The list of agenda tasks.
      Returns:
      The agenda task.

      Cancels a task in the agenda.
      Parameters:
      agendaTaskID - The ID of the agenda task.
      responsible - The responsible collaborator.
      Returns:

    • getAgendaEntryByID

      public AgendaEntry getAgendaEntryByID(int agendaEntryID, String responsible)

      agendaEntryID - The ID of the agenda entry.
      Returns:
      The agenda entry.

    • getAgendaBackUpByID

      public AgendaEntry getAgendaBackUpByID(int agendaEntryID, String responsible)
      Retrieves an agenda entry from the backup agenda list based on its ID and responsible collaborator. This method retrieves the agenda entry with the specified ID from the backup agenda list for the given responsible collaborator.
      Parameters:
      agendaEntryID - The ID of the agenda entry to retrieve.
      responsible - The responsible collaborator associated with the agenda entry.
      Returns:
      The agenda entry with the specified ID and responsible collaborator from the backup agenda list.

    • getAgendaEntriesForResponsible

      public List<AgendaEntry> getAgendaEntriesForResponsible(String responsible)
      Gets the agenda entries for a specific responsible collaborator.
      Parameters:
      responsible - The responsible collaborator.
      Returns:
      A list of agenda entries.

    • getAgendaEntriesForResponsibleTeam

      public List<AgendaEntry> getAgendaEntriesForResponsibleTeam(String responsible)
      Retrieves a list of agenda entries for a team responsible for a specific task.
      Parameters:
      responsible - the identifier for the responsible team
      Returns:
      a list of AgendaEntry objects associated with the responsible team

    • getAgendaEntriesForResponsibleVehicle

      public List<AgendaEntry> getAgendaEntriesForResponsibleVehicle(String responsible)
      Retrieves a list of agenda entries for a vehicle responsible for a specific task.
      Parameters:
      responsible - the identifier for the responsible vehicle
      Returns:
      a list of AgendaEntry objects associated with the responsible vehicle

    • getAgendaEntriesBackUp

      public List<AgendaEntry> getAgendaEntriesBackUp(String responsible)
      Retrieves the backup agenda entries associated with a specific responsible collaborator. This method returns a list of backup agenda entries for the given responsible collaborator.
      Parameters:
      responsible - The responsible collaborator for whom to retrieve backup agenda entries.
      Returns:
      A list of backup agenda entries associated with the specified responsible collaborator.

    • getAgendaEntries

      public List<AgendaEntry> getAgendaEntries()
      Gets all agenda entries.
      Returns:
      A list of all agenda entries.

      public boolean assignVehicle(AgendaEntry agendaTask, Vehicle vehicle)
      Assigns a vehicle to an agenda task.
      Parameters:
      agendaTask - The agenda task.
      vehicle - The vehicle to assign.
      Returns:
      true if the vehicle was assigned successfully, false otherwise.

      public void createNewAgendaList()
